title: "Artificial Intelligence and the Tetris Conundrum"
excerpt: "In a pioneering study led by Cornell University, researchers embarked on an exploratory journey into the realms of algorithmic fairness in a two-player version of the classic game Tetris. The experiment was founded on a simple yet profound premise: Players who received fewer turns during the game perceived their opponent as less likable,"
